title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
The Federal Reserve banks of Boston and Dallas said their presidents were resigning, following reports of the two leaders' investment trading that prompted calls for their departures.

Ford plans to build its first new U.S. assembly plant in decades, along with three battery factories, to fortify its push into electric vehicles as the industry accelerates green-tech investments.

Merck is in advanced talks to acquire Acceleron, in a move that would bolster the pharmaceutical giant's rare-disease business.

CAA is acquiring rival talent agency ICM in another sign that Hollywood's traditional business model is being upended.

Blackstone reached an agreement to sell the Cosmopolitan casino and hotel on the Las Vegas Strip for $5.65 billion.

The S&P 500 and Nasdaq declined 0.3% and 0.5%, respectively, while the Dow gained 0.2%.

What's News: Business & Finance
